verses.verse: שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> O בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> ye this O house יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob הַנִּקְרָאִים֙ <S%H7121><s%> which are called בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> by the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִמֵּ֥י <S%H4325><s%> out of the waters יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יָצָ֑אוּ <S%H3318><s%> and are come forth הַֽנִּשְׁבָּעִ֣ים ׀ <S%H7650><s%> which swear בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> by the name יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּבֵאלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יַזְכִּ֔ירוּ <S%H2142><s%> and make mention לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor בֶאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> [but] not in truth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor בִצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> nor in righteousness

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> themselves of the holy נִקְרָ֔אוּ <S%H7121><s%> For they call וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> themselves upon the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נִסְמָ֑כוּ <S%H5564><s%> and stay יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name ס

הָרִֽאשֹׁנוֹת֙ <S%H7223><s%> the former things מֵאָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> from the beginning הִגַּ֔דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> I have declared וּמִפִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> out of my mouth יָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> and they went forth וְאַשְׁמִיעֵ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> and I shewed פִּתְאֹ֥ם <S%H6597><s%> [them] suddenly עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> them I did וַתָּבֹֽאנָה׃ <S%H935><s%> and they came to pass

מִדַּעְתִּ֕י <S%H1847><s%> Because I knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that קָשֶׁ֖ה <S%H7186><s%> that thou [art] obstinate אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וְגִ֤יד <S%H1517><s%> sinew בַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> [is] an iron עָרְפֶּ֔ךָ <S%H6203><s%> and thy neck וּמִצְחֲךָ֖ <S%H4696><s%> and thy brow נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H5154><s%> brass

וָאַגִּ֤יד <S%H5046><s%> declared לְךָ֙ מֵאָ֔ז <S%H227><s%> I have even from the beginning בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before תָּב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> [it] to thee before it came to pass הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H8085><s%> I shewed פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תֹּאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> [it] thee lest thou shouldest say עָצְבִּ֣י <S%H6091><s%> idol עָשָׂ֔ם <S%H6213><s%> hath done וּפִסְלִ֥י <S%H6459><s%> them and my graven image וְנִסְכִּ֖י <S%H5262><s%> and my molten image צִוָּֽם׃ <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded

שָׁמַ֤עְתָּֽ <S%H8085><s%> Thou hast heard חֲזֵה֙ <S%H2372><s%> see כֻּלָּ֔הּ <S%H3605><s%> all וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תַגִּ֑ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> all this and will not ye declare הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֤יךָ <S%H8085><s%> [it]? I have shewed חֲדָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H2319><s%> thee new things מֵעַ֔תָּה <S%H6258><s%> from this time וּנְצֻר֖וֹת <S%H5341><s%> even hidden things וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not יְדַעְתָּֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> and thou didst not know

עַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> now נִבְרְאוּ֙ <S%H1254><s%> They are created וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not מֵאָ֔ז <S%H227><s%> for וְלִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> now and not from the beginning even before י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתָּ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> when thou heardest פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> you will not תֹּאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> them not lest thou shouldest say הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יְדַעְתִּֽין׃ <S%H3045><s%> Behold I knew

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Even לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> Yea thou heardest גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> Even לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> not yea thou knewest גַּ֕ם <S%H1571><s%> Even מֵאָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not פִתְּחָ֣ה <S%H6605><s%> was not opened אָזְנֶ֑ךָ <S%H241><s%> not yea from that time [that] thine ear כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3045><s%> for I knew בָּג֣וֹד <S%H901><s%> treacherous תִּבְגּ֔וֹד <S%H898><s%> that thou wouldest deal very וּפֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H6586><s%> a transgressor מִבֶּ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> from the womb קֹ֥רָא <S%H7121><s%> and wast called לָֽךְ׃

לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake שְׁמִי֙ <S%H8034><s%> For my name's אַאֲרִ֣יךְ <S%H748><s%> sake will I defer אַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> mine anger וּתְהִלָּתִ֖י <S%H8416><s%> and for my praise אֶחֱטָם־ <S%H2413><s%> will I refrain לָ֑ךְ לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> not הַכְרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3772><s%> for thee that I cut thee not off

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold צְרַפְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H6884><s%> Behold I have refined וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> as בְכָ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> thee but not with silver בְּחַרְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H977><s%> I have chosen בְּכ֥וּר <S%H3564><s%> thee in the furnace עֹֽנִי׃ <S%H6040><s%> of affliction

לְמַעֲנִ֧י <S%H4616><s%> sake לְמַעֲנִ֛י <S%H4616><s%> sake אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> For mine own sake [even] for mine own sake will I do כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> how יֵחָ֑ל <S%H2490><s%> [it] for how should [my name] be polluted וּכְבוֹדִ֖י <S%H3519><s%> my glory לְאַחֵ֥ר <S%H312><s%> unto another לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> ? and I will not give ס

שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> Hearken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> unto me O Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel מְקֹרָאִ֑י <S%H7121><s%> my called אֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am רִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> I [am] he I [am] the first אַ֖ף <S%H637><s%> I am also אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <S%H314><s%> I also [am] the last

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Surely יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> Mine hand יָ֣סְדָה <S%H3245><s%> also hath laid the foundation אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וִֽימִינִ֖י <S%H3225><s%> and my right hand טִפְּחָ֣ה <S%H2946><s%> hath spanned שָׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens קֹרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> [when] I call אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to יַעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> unto them they stand up יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

הִקָּבְצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> All ye assemble כֻלְּכֶם֙ <S%H3605><s%> all וּֽשֲׁמָ֔עוּ <S%H8085><s%> yourselves and hear מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who בָהֶ֖ם הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> which among them hath declared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֲהֵב֔וֹ <S%H157><s%> hath loved יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> him he will do חֶפְצוֹ֙ <S%H2656><s%> his pleasure בְּבָבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> on Babylon וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> and his arm כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <S%H3778><s%> [shall be on] the Chaldeans

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> I [even] I have spoken אַף־ <S%H637><s%> indeed קְרָאתִ֑יו <S%H7121><s%> yea I have called הֲבִיאֹתִ֖יו <S%H935><s%> him I have brought וְהִצְלִ֥יחַ <S%H6743><s%> prosperous דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> him and he shall make his way

קִרְב֧וּ <S%H7126><s%> Come אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> to me שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> unto me hear זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> From מֵרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> from the beginning בַּסֵּ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> in secret דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> ye this I have not spoken מֵעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> from the time הֱיוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H1961><s%> took שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> was there אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now אֲדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> that it was there [am] I and now the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD שְׁלָחַ֖נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent וְרוּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7307><s%> and his Spirit פ

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD גֹּאַלְךָ֖ <S%H1350><s%> thy Redeemer קְד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God מְלַמֶּדְךָ֣ <S%H3925><s%> which teacheth לְהוֹעִ֔יל <S%H3276><s%> thee to profit מַדְרִֽיכֲךָ֖ <S%H1869><s%> which leadeth בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee by the way תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> go

ל֥וּא <S%H3863><s%> O that הִקְשַׁ֖בְתָּ <S%H7181><s%> thou hadst hearkened לְמִצְוֹתָ֑י <S%H4687><s%> to my commandments וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> have been כַנָּהָר֙ <S%H5104><s%> been as a river שְׁלוֹמֶ֔ךָ <S%H7965><s%> then had thy peace וְצִדְקָתְךָ֖ <S%H6666><s%> and thy righteousness כְּגַלֵּ֥י <S%H1530><s%> as the waves הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> have been כַחוֹל֙ <S%H2344><s%> also had been as the sand זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2233><s%> Thy seed וְצֶאֱצָאֵ֥י <S%H6631><s%> and the offspring מֵעֶ֖יךָ <S%H4578><s%> of thy bowels כִּמְעֹתָ֑יו <S%H4579><s%> like the gravel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> never יִכָּרֵ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> should not have been cut off וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> never יִשָּׁמֵ֛ד <S%H8045><s%> nor destroyed שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> thereof his name מִלְּפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> from before

צְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> Go ye forth מִבָּבֶל֮ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בִּרְח֣וּ <S%H1272><s%> flee מִכַּשְׂדִּים֒ <S%H3778><s%> ye from the Chaldeans בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> with a voice רִנָּ֗ה <S%H7440><s%> of singing הַגִּ֤ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> declare הַשְׁמִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> ye tell זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הוֹצִיא֖וּהָ <S%H3318><s%> this utter עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> out קְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> it [even] to the end הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אִמְר֕וּ <S%H559><s%> say גָּאַ֥ל <S%H1350><s%> hath redeemed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> ye The LORD עַבְדּ֥וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not צָמְא֗וּ <S%H6770><s%> And they thirsted בָּחֳרָבוֹת֙ <S%H2723><s%> them through the deserts הֽוֹלִיכָ֔ם <S%H1980><s%> led מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> he caused the waters מִצּ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> out of the rock הִזִּ֣יל <S%H5140><s%> to flow לָ֑מוֹ וַיִּ֨בְקַע־ <S%H1234><s%> for them he clave צ֔וּר <S%H6697><s%> the rock וַיָּזֻ֖בוּ <S%H2100><s%> gushed out מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> also and the waters
אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> There שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [There is] no peace אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָרְשָׁעִֽים׃ <S%H7563><s%> unto the wicked ס
